name: Adventures of Dragon - Space Battle weapons
detailed_description:
Space Battle weapons is the first content pack for Adventures of Dragon, bringing new weapons and a new sexy move.

  • New Location, Space Station Beta avaivable via Warp Drive
  • 4 new weapons
  • New NPC "Horsehung Mask" that rewards you with a new Sexy move "Cock Block" if you have had sex with enough women
  • New Achievement "Horse Trained"
